mapper.sql: ((clothName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or brandName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') and cateCode like '%' || #{cateCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
mapper.select:
select count(*) from mus_cloth where
and clothId >0
select DISTINCT cateCode from mus_cloth where

select DISTINCT count(*) as cateCount, a.cateCode, b.cateName from mus_cloth a left join mus_cate b on a.cateCode = b.cateCode where (clothName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or brandName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') and a.cateCode = #{cateCode}
group by a.cateCode, b.cateName

select a.clothId, a.clothName, a.sellerId, b.brandName, a.PUBLEYEAR, a.CATECODE, c.CATENAME, a.clothPrice, a.clothStock, a.clothDiscount, a.clothIntro, a.clothContents from mus_cloth a left outer join mus_seller b on a.sellerId = b.sellerId left outer join mus_cate c on a.catecode = c.catecode where clothId = ${clothId}
